basic.subject: Math
basic.shortDescription: Game Over Gopher is an exciting tower defense game built around the coordinate grid. To defend a prize carrot, the player selects various tools to “feed” the space gophers marching hungrily toward it. Game Over Gopher guides students in plotting. You’ll stretch your numerical, algebraic and algorithmic problem solving skills as you try to rescue the lovable Wuzzits from the cages by rotating the cogs in the gears mechanism.  One reviewer described this engaging game as Angry Birds meets Lumosity.
basic.description: Game Over Gopher is an exciting tower defense game built around the coordinate grid. To defend a prize carrot, the player selects various tools to “feed” the space gophers marching hungrily toward it. Game Over Gopher guides students in plotting. You’ll stretch your numerical, algebraic and algorithmic problem solving skills as you try to rescue the lovable Wuzzits from the cages by rotating the cogs in the gears mechanism.  One reviewer described this engaging game as Angry Birds meets Lumosity.

wo1.name: Struggling with Level
wo1.description: This student has failed a level at least 3 times, and may be struggling to understand basic gameplay mechanics.

wo2.name: No Corn Silos
wo2.description: Player has not used the Corn Silo tool, and may be having trouble manipulating x and y coordinates to choose a location on the path.

wo3.name: No Iceberg Lettuce
wo3.description: Player has not used the Iceberg Lettuce tool, and may not be able to locate the origin (0,0).

wo4.name: No Melon Strike
wo4.description: Player has not used the Melon Strike tool, and may not understand quadrant names.

wo5.name: No Wheatgrass Blaster
wo5.description: Player has not used the Wheatgrass Blaster tool, and may not understand how to create a vertical or horizontal line using x or y coordinates.

wo6.name: Struggling with Challenge Round
wo6.description: Player may not understand how to predict points on a graph, and have struggled with challenge level [n].

so1.name: Challenge Round Skill
so1.description: The player has successfully solved a challenge round in fewer than 5 guesses.

so2.name: Tool Expert
so2.description: Player has successfully used every tool in Game Over Gopher.

so3.name: Challenge Round Expert
so3.description: Player has completed all challenge rounds.
